location: Chengde Road Section 1, Datong District, near Zhongshan MRT Station (249m) and Shuanglian MRT Station (477m)

Note: no pets allowed, NT$5,237/month management fee on top of rent, and 2-month deposit required. For a couple with a baby, the balcony railing safety and window locks should be inspected in person; modernity of fixtures is unclear from the limited description.
